Subject: RE: ) - Epstein 
Date: Fri, 30 Aug 2019 14:09:02 +0000 
Joe, 
Thanks for reaching out. We are trying to sort out how to handle the travel issues based on the weather, and we should 
have a better sense of the plan by later today. As we're troubleshooting scheduling issues, it would be helpful to know if 
you and your client would be available on 9/5, or on any date the following week. 
Thanks, 
From: Joe Nascimento 4
Sent: Friday, August 30, 2019 9:51 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: - Epstein 
Good 
morning, 
Just wanted to check in to see if you still planned to travel south given the storm. Current estimates show a 
landing (somewhere) Tuesday with very bad weather on Wednesday. Airports might close (which will answer my 
question), but that's a guess. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Joseph 
E. Nascimento, Esq. 
ROSS AMSEL RABEN NASCIMENTO, PLLC

Miami Florida 33129

HIM, 
I just wanted to follow up re the August 14th meeting. Is it possible to schedule for early afternoon (anytime after 1)? I 
have proactive cooperation ongoing in another case involving multiple jurisdictions, and they are looking to meet the 
morning of 8/14. I understand if your schedule is already set, and will work around it. 
EFTA00020675

Joe

Thanks,

get a sense of your schedules, for planning purposes. 
Thanks,

schedules may be somewhat unpredictable tomorrow; would it  work to set a time to talk on Tuesday? We 
can schedule it for before you meet wia, if that's helpful. Or if you'd like to talk sooner, we

us know what you prefer, and we look forward to being in touch. 
thank 
you,
